name: The Duck's Bills
description:
The Duck's Bills is a game about trying to keep your potion shop going by paying back ever increasing debts at the end of each day. You take control of Ducky McHat as you run around the island gathering ingredients and brewing up potions to your customers' request.

Created by Samuel Burnett and Gregory Bedford for the SA Game Jam 2020
48 Hour entry eligable for every category except Diversity, Student or Hobbyist

Content made before the start of the Jam : 
I made the rough layout of the main menu with options for invert Y, sensitivity and empty controls for volume controls (functionality was added during the jam)
I made a basic save system to store different profiles and the preferences for those options.
A lot of the prep was scrapped before the jam, mainly for the Wwise Plugin, but we then used the Unreal Engine audio systems instead.
All audio work was done during the jam.
